name: 30cm x 30cm Square Canvas Print
description:
30cm x 30cm square canvas print of any square format image from robincaddy.co.uk (please note the image will wrap around the frame as seen in the sample picture)
To indicate which image you want, please use the following notation in the note to seller field in PayPal: category, page/image
The image number is anti-clockwise from top left so for example the bottom right image on landscape page 1 would be ordered as: Landscape 1.3
Top right Monochrome page 5 would be: Monochrome 5.1
Other sizes are available please email me robincaddy@hotmail.co.uk for a quote.
